headline: Roberson (knee) didn't end up seeing the court in Sunday's 115-92 loss to the Cavaliers, but is expected to return to action at some point of the Thunder's two-game road trip that begins Wednesday against the Mavericks, Anthony Slater of The Oklahoman rep
